text: new at six a chesapeake couple got an
unexpected union in the middle of

gives us a look at their surprise
wedding
quite the adventure
amy and kenny lucas are back home in

we were at bahama and nassau in the
bahamas
newlyweds
unexpectedly it ended up being a
life-changing trip for us yes

happened to be filming segments at the

and their two best friends if they

joy behar behind the bar and we said
sure

little did they know
why don't you two get married it's

a quick sun-kissed spontaneous wedding

certainly not in front of cameras and a

it will be unforgettable forever
made more special by the circumstances

after a pivotal moment in amy's life
back in 2019 the day she rang the bell
following her last chemotherapy
treatment on her way to beating breast
cancer
she had no idea it was coming so
apparently we just like to do things
differently
celebrating each other without the

amy and kenny know the power of living
and loving in the moment
